description:
Richard and Catesby continue their mission to win George back to the Yorkist cause. Meanwhile, Henry laments his position as Warwick raises an army to prevent Edward`s return.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I Remember When Christmas Was Approaching. The Time When I Lost Father.
I Remember When Christmas Was Approaching. The Time When I Lost Father.
I remember when Christmas was approaching. The time when I lost Father.
